ctu_text: ", "detailedDescription": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "\u201cNatural Calamity Relief to Fishermen of State\u201d is a scheme by the Department of Fisheries, Government of Goa. Through this scheme, financial assistance is provided to the active fishermen who contribute to the Fishermen Corpus Relief Fund, whose fishing vessels are damaged or lost due to natural calamities. The applications are accepted only in offline mode.
